name: Perfect Crime (itch)
description:
Perfect Crime its a game about a thief that's going to commit a perfect crime: steal a painting in the most secure museum in the world without leaving any traces.

How to play:

Proceed in the museum to reach the painting, steal it and return to the start to escape. You have to do this while avoid been seen by the security cameras.

  • ← / → - Move
  • ↑ - Jump
  • Spacebar - Interact
  • E / Esc - Pause
